Description: Standard menu with graphic menu items.
Name: Button Menu

Description: Conventional menu with textual menu items.
Name: Menu

Description: Conventional clickable button.
Name: Button

Description: Conventional short text edit field. Does not allow paragraph breaks or use scroll bars.
Name: Text - Short

Description: Frame for full screen display.
Name: View

Description: Tabbed information grouping. Partial screen display.
Name: Group

Description: Grouped display of related information with header and border.
Name: Block

Description: Non-editable text display.
Name: Text - Static

Description: Vertical display of a sequence of attribute-value pairs. The list of attribute-value pairs are defined explicitly.
Name: Attribute Group

Description: Mathematical plot of data.
Name: Chart

Description: Control boundaries of geospatial region. N/S and E/W designators toggle when clicked.
Name: Geospatial Extent

Description: Control boundaries of temporal region.
Name: Temporal Extent

Description: Conventional extended text edit field. Allows free form text entry and  paragraph breaks. In non-edit mode, only displays first five lines with ...more... elipses marker. Drill-down or popup display to display remaining text.
Name: Text - Extended

Description: Conventional tabular display, with filtering, sorting and editing of column headers.
Name: Table

Description: Conventional radio button.
Name: Radio Button

Description: Interactive map display
Name: Map

Description: Interactive 2-d network graph display
Name: Graph

Description: Conventional drop-down selector.
Name: Dropdown

Description: Conventional checkbox.
Name: Checkbox

Description: Popup display of contextual information. Note that callouts are resource-centric and display information from the "Preview Resource."
Name: Callout

Description: Wireframe map to display current geographic context and/or control interactive map widget.
Name: Context Map

Description: Veritical display of repeating information for a list of elements. Like a table, without table formatting and behaviors. Displays fixed number of elements - first N in list?
Name: List

Description: Visual presentation of fixed size and layout of information content.
Name: Tile

Description: Control boundaries of geospatial vertical region.
Name: Vertical Extent

Description: Conventional display of screen graphic.
Name: Image

Description: Conventional icon graphic.
Name: Icon

Description: Display of geospatical point. Do we need vertical & horizontal.
Name: Geospatial Point

Description: Container to display contents based on information format:	- Image (png, jpg, bmp, etc.)	- PDF
Name: Mime Viewer
